title: WEAVE: The next generation wide-field spectroscopy facility for the WHT (Cambridge Element: 2014/17)
abstractText: This is a joint proposal and this section is completed on the Lead Institution application
impactText: This grant supports the development of the data handling system for the WEAVE telescope.
findingsText: The grant will support the development of the data analysis and management system for the WEAVE multi object spectrograph on the WHT. The data analysis systems have relevance to a range of other fields, including for medical image analysis. Environment,Healthcare
